title: S2 (previous G5) LFT
body: I main the fuck out of top lane, basically riven or any tank. Not looking for a super serious team and i cant use voice comms :/ but i dont flame, and im keen to get some wins :)) add me in-game if youre interested fellas.

replies.body: Hey man my team is currently looking for a Top laner because we do currently have 5 but our top laner works full time so we need a second one. Just wondering, why can't you use voice comms?
